name: Ensure queues are not publicly accessible
body: Cï»¿yscale looks for managed queues that allow unrestricted access from the internet. Using publicly accessible queues allows anyone to send, intercept and delete messages leading to a potential data leakage to unwanted third parties.
remediationDescription:
Depending on the provider and service that you use, check out the following resources:

#### AWS

* [SQS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/latest/SQSDeveloperGuide/sqs-security-best-practices.html)

#### GCP

* [Pub/Sub](https://cloud.google.com/pubsub/docs/access-control)
